dmca.title: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://www.helbreathnem
dmca.body:
DMCA please see word doc. attached.

________________________________

From: Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2007 9:29 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://www.helbreathnemesis.com/
Importance: High



To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please be more specific on how it does not comply with, or show
sufficient evidence that they are hosting information that is clearly
covered by copyright.

 

We've provided, as requested screenshots, html, emails, and documents
that detail that IEntertainment are within their legal right to pursue
the issue, and that the files, images and sounds being used by your
client are being used illegally. I've included such documents again with
this email. I've also included a emails to me from their previous hosts.

 

Thank you for your time. 

 

Sincerely,

 

Tamara Bryan
Helbreath USA
Game Master

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Legal Response <mailto:legalresponse@theplanet.com>  
        To: tbryan@ient.com 
        Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
        Sent: Tuesday, December 12, 2006 3:43 AM
        Subject: FW: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on
your servers. http://www.helbreathnemesis.com/

        To Whom It May Concern:

         

        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

         

        Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of
your claim.

         

        Please visit our web site at 
www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

         

        Legal Response Team

        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

        From: Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
        Sent: Saturday, December 09, 2006 7:41 PM
        To: Legal Response
        Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. http://www.helbreathnemesis.com/
        Importance: High
        
        
        Hello,

         

        I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA
http://www.helbreathusa.com .  I am contacting you in regards to the web
site http://www.helbreathnemesis.com/

         

        The official game site of the developer is located at 
http://www.helbreath.com <http://www.helbreath.com/>  and legally
licensed by http://www.helbreathusa.com <http://www.helbreathusa.com/> .
This web site is hosting information and files advertising and how to
connect to their illegal server.  We, iENT, are authorized by the
copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal servers.

         

        Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy
related material.  The source code for this game was illegally leaked to
the public, and altered by those not authorized by the copyright holder.

         

        The participants are violating the copyright agreement as your
servers are being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this
abuse of our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing this
website.

         

        The user has blocked my IP from being able to view the web site,
given that they know that I'm writing to the company that hosts the
site. They've also stated that IEntertainment should stop emailing their
service providers "or else" they'll release the source code publicly.
I've had to go to a different location in order to view the site, and
have others provide me with information from it. Please advise me of
exactly what action has been taken so that I can advise the copyright
owner and get that information back to you with what's needed.  

         

        Thank you for your prompt action in this matter.

         

        Sincerely, 

         

        Tamara Bryan

        Game Master Helbreath USA
